price: Nhemfo {anaa mpanimfoͻ} a wͻwͻ Farao nkorͻfoͻ no mu no kaa sε: “Nokorε sε, wi yε nkonyaayini a onim de (anaasε waben).
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
